attributes.action: Bring back school discipline and safer schools that adults run.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Schools have now fallen apart with poor behaviour and we are relying 100% on the parent this is not working. Lets go back to adults being in control of our young guiding them and giving them bondaries rather than the child centred rubbish we have today. Children have not changed adults attitudes towards children have and its not working. Teachers, police and the public should have the right to guide children who are not behaving in the street or at school.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Discipline/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
